comments.body:
@voxmatt Could you follow the instructions at the following link for updating a package to a new major version?
https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#i-want-to-update-a-package-to-a-new-major-version
@kastermester The utility types of the same names that you used where removing the optionality modifiers from props, so went with these instead.
